## {{< fa chalkboard-user >}} Teaching

I work as a **Visiting Professor** at the [Graduate Program in Territorial Planning](https://www.uefs.br/) at the State University of Feira de Santana (UEFS), teaching courses related to my research areas.

Previously, I served as a volunteer professor at the Federal Institute of Sergipe (IFS — São Cristóvão Campus, 2021–2023) and as a visiting professor at the Agrotechnical State School of Jeremoabo (2011–2012).

---

## {{< fa people-group >}} Supervision

I supervise undergraduate theses, master's dissertations and doctoral theses in the following areas:

- Sustainable agriculture and *nature-based solutions*
- Soil, water and biodiversity conservation
- Intellectual property, technological prospection and patentometry
- Sustainable innovation, entrepreneurship and technology transfer
- Territorial planning

---

## {{< fa clipboard-check >}} Expectations for Students

Students are expected to develop high-quality work, grounded in relevant scientific literature and with appropriate methodology:

- Comprehensive and up-to-date literature review
- Clear identification of research gaps
- Rigorous and reproducible methodological approach
- Scientific presentation of results
